Name: AccessLoggingPolicy
Documentation: The AccessLoggingPolicy property describes where and how access logs are stored for the AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer resource.

Parameters.Name: EmitInterval
Parameters.Documentation: The interval for publishing access logs in minutes. You can specify an interval of either 5 minutes or 60 minutes.

Parameters.Name: Enabled
Parameters.Documentation: Whether logging is enabled for the load balancer.

Parameters.Name: S3BucketName
Parameters.Documentation: The name of an Amazon S3 bucket where access log files are stored.

Parameters.Name: S3BucketPrefix
Parameters.Documentation: A prefix for the all log object keys, such as my-load-balancer-logs/prod. If you store log files from multiple sources in a single bucket, you can use a prefix to distinguish each log file and its source.
